import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const DashboardDirector = ({ token, rol }) => { const [data, setData] = useState({ total_empresa: 0, total_vales: 0, promotores: [], cajeros: [], clientes: [] }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { const endpoint = rol === 'director' ? '/dashboard/director' : '/dashboard/supervisor'; axios.get(`http://localhost:8000${endpoint}`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }) .then(res => setData(res.data)) .catch(() => setError('Error al cargar los datos')); }, [token, rol]); return (

{rol === 'director' ? 'Dashboard Director' : 'Dashboard Supervisor'}

{error &&
{error}
}

Total Empresa

${data.total_empresa?.toLocaleString()}

Total Vales

{data.total_vales}

{rol === 'director' && (

Pagos Pendientes

${data.pagos_pendientes?.toLocaleString()}

)}

Promotores

{rol === 'director' && } {data.promotores.map(p => ( {rol === 'director' && } ))}
Nombre Total Vales Monto TotalPagos Pendientes
{p.nombre} {p.total_vales} ${p.monto_total?.toLocaleString()}${p.pagos_pendientes?.toLocaleString()}

Cajeros

{rol === 'director' && } {data.cajeros.map(c => ( {rol === 'director' && } ))}
Nombre Total Vales Monto TotalPagos Pendientes
{c.nombre} {c.total_vales} ${c.monto_total?.toLocaleString()}${c.pagos_pendientes?.toLocaleString()}
{rol === 'director' && (

Clientes

{data.clientes.map(c => ( ))}
Nombre Total Vales Monto Total Pagos Pendientes
{c.nombre} {c.total_vales} ${c.monto_total?.toLocaleString()} ${c.pagos_pendientes?.toLocaleString()}
)}
); }; export default DashboardDirector;
